NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Works for complete or part construction and civil engineering work
Construction work for pipelines, communication and power lines, for highways, roads, airfields and railways; flatwork

CODIF_DATA.AA_AUTHORITY_TYPE: Ministry or any other national or federal authority
CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01A03

TITLE.P: DfI TNI T-1059 Term Contracts for Asphalt Resurfacing 2017

SHORT_DESCR.P: The term contracts for Asphalt Resurfacing 2017 may include but not limited to the following work activities: laying various types of asphalt, asphalt concrete and thin surfacing using mechanical means and by hand, reshaping of carriageways, adjustment of street furniture to new levels, adjustment and provision of kerblines, adjustment and provision of carriageway drainage systems, traffic management, road marking, road studs and other associated ancillary works (excluding street lighting) for the following contract areas: ARS2 (2017) — Newry, Mourne and Down; ARW1 (2017) — Mid Ulster (Cookstown, Dungannon, Magherafelt); ARW2 (2017) — Derry and Strabane; ARW4 (2017) — Omagh.

The term contracts for Asphalt Resurfacing 2017 may include but not limited to the following work activities: laying various types of asphalt, asphalt concrete and thin surfacing using mechanical means and by hand, reshaping of carriageways, adjustment of street furniture to new levels, adjustment and provision of kerblines, adjustment and provision of carriageway drainage systems, traffic management, road marking, road studs and other associated ancillary works (excluding street lighting) for the following contract areas: ARS2 (2017) — Newry, Mourne and Down; ARW1 (2017) — Mid Ulster (Cookstown, Dungannon, Magherafelt); ARW2 (2017) — Derry and Strabane; ARW4 (2017) — Omagh.

INFO_ADD.P: The Department has decided that it is in the public interest to close this procurement competition and not to proceed with the awards of these contracts.
